message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $11,500. I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $10,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer. I understand your budget constraints, however, $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I've considered your proposal and I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product.
